name: nancom

stmt.origin: 3bitr4i(wnan(w0, w1), wnan(w1, w0), wi(w0, wn(w1)), wi(w1, wn(w0)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wnan(w0, w1), wnan(w1, w0))
-| wb(wi(w0, wn(w1)), wi(w1, wn(w0)))
-| wb(wnan(w0, w1), wi(w0, wn(w1)))
-| wb(wnan(w1, w0), wi(w1, wn(w0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wnan(w0, w1), wnan(w1, w0))
-| wb(wi(w0, wn(w1)), wi(w1, wn(w0)))
-| wb(wnan(w0, w1), wi(w0, wn(w1)))
-| wb(wnan(w1, w0), wi(w1, wn(w0)))

|- wb(wnan(w0, w1), wnan(w1, w0))
-| wb(wnan(w0, w1), wi(w0, wn(w1)))
-| wb(wnan(w1, w0), wi(w1, wn(w0)))

|- wb(wnan(w0, w1), wnan(w1, w0))
-| wb(wnan(w1, w0), wi(w1, wn(w0)))

comment: Alternative denial is commutative. Remark: alternative denial is not associative, see ~ nanass . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-May-2015.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 26-Jun-2020.)
